statements: UPDATE simulations SET performance_metrics = '{"accuracy": 0.85, "time": 25}' WHERE simulation_id = 1;
UPDATE simulations SET algorithm_used = 'Random Forest' WHERE simulation_id = 10;
UPDATE simulations SET algorithm_used = 'Algorithm A', test_scenario = 'Scenario B' WHERE simulation_id = 1;
UPDATE simulations SET performance_metrics = '{"accuracy": 95, "precision": 85, "recall": 90}' WHERE simulation_name = 'Example Simulation';
UPDATE simulations SET simulation_name='New Simulation Name' WHERE simulation_id=1;
UPDATE test_scenarios SET test_type='Regression' WHERE scenario_id=2;
UPDATE simulations SET simulation_name = 'Production', simulation_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE simulation_id = 100;
UPDATE test_scenarios SET test_type = 'Regression', scenario_name = 'Scenario 2' WHERE scenario_id = 200;
UPDATE simulations SET simulation_name = 'Simulation ABC', description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE autonomous_driving_algorithms SET algorithm_description = 'Improved algorithm performance', last_updated = '2021-12-15 10:30:00' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE simulations SET description = 'Updated description', simulation_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE autonomous_driving_algorithms SET algorithm_description = 'Improved algorithm performance', last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE simulation_results SET success='true', distance_covered=100.5 WHERE simulation_id=123;
UPDATE algorithm_performance SET execution_time=50.34, success='false' WHERE algorithm_id=456 AND simulation_id=789;
UPDATE simulation_results SET success = TRUE, distance_covered = 150.75 WHERE simulation_id = 101
UPDATE algorithm_parameters SET parameter_value = 'updated_value' WHERE algorithm_id = 201
UPDATE Simulation SET status = 'completed' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE Vehicle SET manufacturer = 'Toyota', year = 2022 WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE Simulation SET status = 'completed' WHERE scenario_name = 'Highway Traffic';
UPDATE Vehicle SET year = 2023, manufacturer = 'Ford' WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
